name: Basculegion ♂
description: The Big Fish Pokémon. Clads itself in the souls of comrades that perished before fulfilling their goals of journeying upstream. No other species throughout all Hisui's rivers is Basculegion's equal.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: This Pokémon's speed is doubled in rainy conditions.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.description: When this Pokémon uses a move of its own type, it may roll the damage twice and choose either total.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: This Pokémon's moves ignore any abilities that would lessen their effect or ability to hit an opponent (Due to things like Water Absorb, Snow Cloak, Thick Fat, Sturdy, etc.)
